data.text: «N mu dunduma Siyoni xa fe ra,
Na tɛmui ɲamanɛe wo xa tinxinyi toma nɛ,
Wo findima nɛ ɲama tofanyi ra Alatala bɛlɛxɛ kui,
E mu wo xili falama sɔnɔn ‹Bɔxi raboloxi,›
Wo fan wo xa bɔxi tongoma wo yɛtɛ bɛ na ki nɛ,
N kantamae tima nɛ Darisalamu tɛtɛ fari,
Alatala a kalixi nɛ a sɛnbɛ ra,
Naxee xɛ sama, nee nan a donma tantui ra Alatala bɛ.
Alatala xa masenyi nan yi ki duniɲa bɛ,
